sales.name: Mondrian Soho, a Morgans Hotel - New York City
Mondrian Soho, a Morgans Hotel - New York City
Cold Weather Accessories Blowout: Up to 75% Off
The Belt
sales.description: When it comes to accessories that have the power to transform an outfit, belts are at the very top of the list. And waist-cinchers like these go a long way in giving even the simplest pieces a one-of-a-kind look. Take a cue from our stylists — they love topping off high-waisted skirts and shorts with thin leather styles and creating curves by layering wider styles over loose cardigans and dresses.

sales.name: Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need Container
Desk-to-Dinner Dresses
sales.description: A must-have for style-conscious ladies who are constantly on the go? A versatile dress that's as wearable at the office as it is at happy hour. To that end, our buyers have pulled together this beautiful collection. It has something for everyone, from silky shifts to easy-on jersey styles to chic, pleated wraps.

sales.name: Jewelry Under $50
sales.description: It may feel like you’re stealing when you snap up items from our beautiful collection of jewelry under $50, but don’t worry — you won’t end up in cuffs. (Unless, of course, you're lucky enough to snag one of the opulent cuff styles here.) Other can't-miss finds include colorful cocktail rings, dangling earrings, and whimsical pendants — and that's just the beginning.

sales.name: TRIA Beauty: Laser Hair Removal & Acne Devices
sales.description: When flawless, smooth skin is a necessity our beauty buyers turn to the skin-care gurus at TRIA. Some of the brand's best are on offer here: The TRIA Hair Removal Laser, an FDA-cleared, at-home laser, gives you the same results you'd get with in-office treatments. The TRIA Blue Light is the ultimate acne treatment, guaranteed to give you clearer, smoother, blemish-free skin, by reducing acne-causing bacteria at their source—so go on, get your glow on!

sales.name: Cold Weather Accessories Blowout: Up to 75% Off
Handbags Under $175
sales.description: Clutches, satchels, crossbodies, totes... Every fashionable woman knows the power of the perfect handbag — which is why we've rounded up this can't-miss selection of our favorite picks. Ladies, bags that are big on style needn't be big-time investments!

sales.name: George Stone Crab Claws
sales.description: From the ocean to your doorstep in less than 24 hours, these fresh (never frozen!) meaty claws are guaranteed to arrive in one piece. George and his team fish off of the Florida coast everyday and sustainably catch 3,000 to 5,000 pounds of stone crabs.

sales.name: See by Chloé
sales.description: See by Chloé, the younger spin-off of iconic French label Chloé, was launched in 2001 and quickly amassed a loyal following of trendsetters, including Natalie Portman and Rachel Bilson. Today’s coveted crop includes an eclectic array of imaginative dresses, girly blouses, pretty cardigans, and plenty more.

sales.name: Carlos Falchi
sales.description: You don't have to look far for a touch of the exotic — just look to Carlos Falchi's Sex and the City-endorsed handbags, rendered in luxe exotic skins like python and microfiber zebra prints. These investment pieces strike a rare balance between downtown street cred and uptown luxury; and classic silhouettes keep them timeless, so you can be sure they'll never go out of style.

sales.name: George Stone Crab Claws
sales.description: From the ocean to your doorstep in less than 24 hours, these fresh (never frozen!) meaty claws are guaranteed to arrive in one piece. George and his team fish off of the Florida coast everyday and sustainably catch 3,000 to 5,000 pounds of stone crabs.

sales.name: Polarn O. Pyret Spring for Kids + Baby
What to Wear to Work: Decoded
sales.description: Put an end to “What should I wear to work today?” with this sale, which includes all the basics for your job, from pencil skirts and fitted blazers to bolder blouses and dresses. The Nine-to-five has never been more fashionable, thanks to Zac Posen, Calvin Klein Collection, Rachel Roy, and more.

sales.name: Under the Sea - Nautical Clothing for Kids!
Eastern Inspiration
sales.description: Inspired by the Far East, we’ve put together this wide selection of treasured finds, all painstakingly crafted with techniques that were employed centuries ago. You’ll find porcelain vases, hand-formed and hand-painted in the traditional Imperial style; furniture featuring exquisite details like hand-painted gilt flowers; and custom-framed, signed artwork.

sales.name: Weekend a la Mer: Girls' & Boys' Apparel
Karen Walker Sunglasses
sales.description: Karen Walker has always been known for her effortlessly cool looks, and in this collection of shades, the emphasis is on cool. Think frames dressed up in bold tortoise, rainbow-bright hues, and oversize silhouettes—not to mention the slick aviators and butterfly frames.

sales.name: Whit
sales.description: Trust us, these basics are anything but boring! Designer Whitney Pozgay's hand transforms these deceptively simple sweaters, blouses, skirts, and dresses into unique, whimsical pieces. Choose from playful patterns and pretty adornments like puff sleeves, pleats, and tie sashes — all of which have made this label a serious staff favorite.

sales.name: Jewelry by Tom Binns & Anton Heunis
sales.description: We love jewelry that surprises, and this array from these two daring designers is full of unexpected thrills. On offer here are some of our favorites: fluorescent earrings, black crystal and skull bib necklaces, oversize colorful cocktail rings, and more.

sales.name: Up to 58% Off Ryder & James
sales.description: Clothes that let kids be kids: Comfort and effortless cool are at the heart of this selection from Ryder & James. Get a glimpse — we chose standout pieces that are sure to enhance your little one's cute factor.

sales.name: Weekend a la Mer: Girls' & Boys' Apparel
Final Few: Up to 70% Off
sales.description: Once in a great while, we wind up with some items that haven't found their way to a good home. It’s tragic, we know. But don't worry, there’s a silver lining. We’re offering them to you — at steeper-than-ever discounts — so we can make way for new gear. We’ve only got a few of each item in stock, so move fast.

sales.name: Chaser Tees for Boys
sales.description: Cutesy graphics and pastels? You won't find them here: This adorably hip brand lets little ones rock out in pint-size band tees designed just for them. When you see these retro shirts, you’ll wish they came in your size, too!

sales.name: A Few of Our Favorites
sales.description: From outerwear and accessories to shirts, footwear, and more, we’ve pulled together a slew of our top picks in this sale — and we did it just for you. Stock up, and thank us later.

sales.name: Kathryn Amberleigh
sales.description: Here at Gilt, we takes shoes seriously — and we'll be the first to admit that our tastes are as varied as the heights of our heels. Which is why we're all such fans of Kathryn Amberleigh's eclectic designs. This collection's got everything you need to make a striking statement: Think striking pumps, polished slingback flats, cool booties, and super-chic flat sandals.

sales.name: The W Hotels Bed
sales.description: Starwood’s W Hotels brand has become a household word among stylish travelers worldwide, and the key to its success has been its room design: it's sleek and modern, with humor and levity added in for good measure. Here, you’ll find bedding and linens from their über-successful home collection. Dive in and pick up a set of Plush or Pillow Top mattresses (the same you’d get in your W suite); complement it with a mattress topper, a crisp featherbed, and a set of “cloud” pillows. Then dress your new bed with W Hotels signature sheeting in cool, modern hues like bisque, charcoal, and glacier blue.

sales.name: Jen Lee Art
sales.description: Energetic washes of color and dreamily abstract scenes define this unquestionably eye-catching art. Just one piece is enough to define a room; or try grouping several for a custom-curated feel. Each work rendered in eco-friendly, solvent-free ink on canvas, and is signed by the artist.

sales.name: Jacadi Spring Apparel & Accessories
sales.description: This children's brand is a true classic — and, in a refreshing palette of pastels and neutrals, a must-have for spring. Cute, meticulously made separates for boys and girls — dresses, tanks, bathing suits, and Bermuda shorts — will be in style this season and well beyond.

sales.name: Yigal Azrouël
sales.description: This Israeli-born, NYC-based designer has long been a top pick of our fashion-forward buyers, and you'll see why when you take a look at the pieces they've selected for this seductive sale. You'll find fresh silhouettes, precise fits, and luxe, all-season fabrics — think edgy dresses and tops with lace sleeves, exposed zippers, and unexpected leather trims.

sales.name: Tai Jewelry
sales.description: One look at young Hollywood, and it's clear that boho-chic jewelry is back in a big way. To nail the look, grab a few bracelets from this designer's spiritually-minded selection—picture wishbones, Hamsa hands, and more—and pile them on. You'll find similar motifs on delicate studs and pendants, too, and they're understated enough for everyday wear.

sales.name: By Terry Cosmetics
sales.description: This makeup master strives to create products that meet the same exacting standards and luxe feel as their couture counterparts. The result is showcased in the brilliant beauty picks here — shop indulgent lipsticks in perfect shades of watermelon and blackberry, vibrant eyeshadows, skin-smoothing foundations, and other treat-your-skin-right finds.

sales.name: Cookware & Bakeware
sales.description: Remember that New Year's resolution you made to cook and/or bake more this year? You're not going to do it if you don't have the tools to do it with. To that end, we've culled the best of the best from our vast selection to inspire you to whip up that lime tilapia or coconut cream pie you've been thinking about making.

sales.name: Cutlery
sales.description: The right cutlery makes mealtime a special event — even if it’s just a quiet evening in. Whether you’re a seasoned chef or an everyday cook, elevate your culinary experience with some of the best cutlery from Gilt Home.

sales.name: Jacadi Spring Apparel & Accessories
sales.description: This children's brand is a true classic—and, in a refreshing palette of pastels and neutrals, a must-have for spring. Cute, meticulously made separates for boys and girls—think dresses, tanks, bathing suits, and Bermuda shorts—will be in impeccable style this season and beyond.

sales.name: Uncle Goose Classic Wooden Blocks
sales.description: Uncle Goose has been around for 30 years, and their experience is reflected in these beautiful wooden toys. Handmade by a small group of artisans, the pretty designs — the blocks flaunt numbers, letters, and more — will keep your kids captivated as they build to their heart's content.

sales.name: The W Hotels Bed
sales.description: Starwood’s W Hotels brand has become a household word among stylish travelers worldwide, and the key to its success has been its room design: sleek and modern, with humor and levity added in for good measure. Here, you’ll find bedding and linens from their über-successful home collection. Dive in and pick up a set of Plush or Pillow Top mattresses (the same you’d get in your W suite); complement it with a mattress topper, a crisp featherbed, and a set of “cloud” pillows. Then dress your new bed with W Hotels signature sheeting in cool, modern hues like bisque, charcoal, and glacier blue.

sales.name: Vanessa Bruno
sales.description: Nicole Kidman and Charlotte Gainsbourg can’t get enough of designer Vanessa Bruno’s edgy elegance—and we can’t either. Think perfectly draped dresses, luxurious blouses, playful jumpers and skirts, and stylish jackets. It's enough to make all the cool kids jealous.

sales.name: How To: Style an Old-World Library
A. Rudin
sales.description: With a modern eye and Old World craftsmanship, A. Rudin fashions their elegant upholstery and case goods in Los Angeles, where this family-owned business has been based for four generations. The company’s commitment to the traditional art and craft of furniture design is evident in hallmark features like hand-tufted upholstery and hand-finished hardwood frames. And the style is quietly elegant, with gentle curves and tailored lines that perfectly bridge classic and contemporary. In sum, an A. Rudin piece is one you can enjoy for a lifetime.

sales.name: James Perse
sales.description: Perse’s super-soft cotton separates have inspired a feverish cult following, and it's easy to see why: They're as flatteringly tailored as they are effortlessly elegant. Slip into a selection of our favorites from the brand, including sweatshirt dresses that are easy as tees, along with slouchy cargo pants and soft hoodies and cardies you'll want to wear every day.

sales.name: Vanessa Bruno Handbags
sales.description: Roomy totes in bright green and coral. Shoulder bags in versatile neutrals. Luxe suede clutches. Vanessa Bruno's assortments of bags here is an eclectic one, and good thing, because we can't get enough of her signature edgy elegance. Whether you're heading to the office or out for date night, you'll find the perfect arm candy here.

sales.name: Tribeca Grand Hotel - New York City
Sanctuary Cap Cana Resort - Dominican Republic
Bonobos
sales.description: Dress your little gentleman in this tailored attire, and he will definitely turn heads. In this handpicked selection, we've got preppy-chic pants and collared shirts that are comfy, cute, and perfect for any occasion.

sales.name: nuLOOM Furniture & Poufs
sales.description: Put a few poufs and an ottoman on a rug, and a couple of chairs around it, and you’ve got the perfect conversation zone. The aforementioned seating pieces are included in this sale, and they're available in silhouettes that range from updated-traditional to sleek-modern and bright tones and neutral hues. Mix and match styles for maximum impact.

sales.name: Finn + Emma
sales.description: Babies will love these super-soft sustainable clothes from Finn + Emma, a brand that's new to Gilt Baby & Kids. The company makes everything from whimsical rompers to reversible jackets, all in 100 percent organic cotton and eco-friendly dyes. These pieces are a treat for babies, parents, and the environment.

sales.name: Colorful Wallets, Cardholders & More
sales.description: You’ve no doubt got a ton of LBDs, but how’s your stash of SLGs? We here at Gilt love to collect small leather goods — and we’ve rounded up an array of options here so you can build your collection too. Luxe and embossed leathers have never been more in vogue, so don't miss these clutches, wallets, shoulder bags, and more, all in a range of neutrals and bright, look-at-me hues.

sales.name: Swarovski Jewelry
sales.description: The name Swarovski is synonymous with crystal, thanks to the company’s unparalleled ability to remain a leader in the ever-evolving jewelry landscape — and their ability to stay on top of the trends. Striking earrings and flashy bracelets are just a few of the fun picks included here. We've also got charming pins and pendants and fun crystal headphones. Sparkle, here you come!

sales.name: Finn + Emma
sales.description: Babies will love these super-soft sustainable clothes from Finn + Emma, a brand that's new to Gilt Baby & Kids. The company makes everything from whimsical rompers to reversible jackets, all in 100 percent organic cotton and eco-friendly dyes. These pieces are a treat for babies, parents, and the environment.

sales.name: 479 Popcorn
sales.description: Jean Arnold, the San Francisco–based, Le Cordon Bleu–trained artisan behind 479 Popcorn, began making her own organic popcorn and flavoring it with exotic seasonings inspired by her international upbringing. In the process, she discovered that 479˚Fahrenheit is the optimal temperature for popping corn.

sales.name: Tribeca Grand Hotel - New York City
Sunglasses Shop
sales.description: Spring’s right around the corner — and summer not long after that — which means now’s the perfect time to invest in a pair of great sunglasses. Luckily for you, we’ve compiled this collection of stylish shades by Oliver Peoples, Linda Farrow, Garrett Leight, and a host of others. Stock up, and get ready for the season ahead.

sales.name: Suit Up
sales.description: You know that old saying about how the suit makes the man? It’s true. Smarten up your look with our impressive selection of suits, blazers, dress shirts, trousers, and accessories in this sartorial blowout.

sales.name: Patrik Ervell & Florsheim by Duckie Brown Shoes
Delman
sales.description: Comfort or style? Here at Gilt, we refuse to choose — which is why we're such fans of Delman. The brand that famously outfitted the feet of Marilyn Monroe shows what they're made of in this sale. Expect to find pointed toe booties you'll wear all season long, plenty of flats, and a few bolder numbers like peep-toe pumps.

sales.name: PlasmaCar
sales.description: Built for boys and girls ages three and up, these super-cool PlasmaCars don’t run on batteries or complicated electric engines — they run on kid power. They come in eye-catching colors like pink and yellow, and can go up to six miles per hour — so don’t forget that helmet!

sales.name: Organic Style: Design House Stockholm, ASA Selection & Design Ideas
sales.description: Fluid-lined vases, unexpectedly curvy mugs, and a candleholder whose lines recall the movement of the wind: There’s a sculptural quality to all the accessories on offer here. If you want your room to possess a restful, artful quality, this collection is a great place to start.

sales.name: Jewelry by Rivka Friedman
sales.description: Elegant and feminine — but never overly safe — these baubles from designer Rivka Friedman are equal parts lighthearted and luxe. Unique stones like red quartzite and topaz crystals mingle with gold settings; and bright, of-the-moment colors also make an appearance in a beautiful array of necklaces, bangles, and rings.

sales.name: Carolina Herrera
sales.description: Every woman needs a show-stopping gown in her closet, and Carolina Herrera’s elegant, glamour-queen designs are always a force to be reckoned with. Here, the Gilt favorite offers a crop of stunning dresses, from flirty cocktail dresses to stunning strapless gowns. And for all those occasions between black-tie events, you'll find trousers, blouses, and shirtdresses that are tailored to perfection.

sales.name: Bonobos
sales.description: Dress your little gentleman in this tailored attire, and he will definitely turn heads. In this handpicked selection, we've got preppy-chic pants and collared shirts that are comfy, cute, and perfect for any occasion.

sales.name: Sunglasses Shop
sales.description: Spring’s right around the corner — and summer not long after that — which means now’s the perfect time to invest in a pair of great sunglasses. Luckily for you, we’ve compiled this collection of stylish shades by Oliver Peoples, Linda Farrow, Garrett Leight, and a host of others. Stock up, and get ready for the season ahead.

sales.name: Charter a Private Yacht in the British Virgin Islands
nuLOOM Contemporary Rugs
sales.description: Interior designers look to New York-based nuLOOM for high-quality rugs. Here, you'll find a bunch of exuberant designs, from flokatis and shags to hand-tufted treasures — each one is suitable for just about every room in the house. The common denominator? Eye-catching colors and prints that'll define a room.

sales.name: Inhabit
sales.description: What are two words that best describe beloved knitwear line Inhabit? Sexy wearability. Our selection from the New York-based label is packed with a stellar selection of easy, sophisticated pieces. Trust us, you’ll want to live in these cozy cardigans, cashmere pullovers, and perfect-for-layering tees and tunics.

sales.name: Isabel Lu
sales.description: Clean lines, luxurious fabrics, classic silhouettes, and sophisticated solid colors — that’s Isabel Lu in a nutshell. So step up your look with pieces from this chic collection, which includes fluttery silk frocks and curve-hugging bustier dresses, of-the-moment wide-leg pants, elegant blouses, and more.

sales.name: nuLOOM Pillows & One-of-a-Kind Rugs
sales.description: Vintage materials, overdyed finishes, and hand-woven details define the one-of-a-kind floor coverings in this sale. Whether you choose a neutral print or something bolder, you’ll be rewarded with a piece that will last a lifetime. Finish off the aesthetic with pillows, from ikats and suzanis to eye-catching patchwork motifs.

sales.name: Up To 70% Off: Luxe Accessories
sales.description: Luxe details and first-rate materials mark this selection of accessories from two acclaimed companies. Think natural-horn cups, an ethereal “Morning Dew” vase, and an alabaster-and-wood photo frame: Whatever you pick, it’ll look, and feel, anything but cookie cutter.

sales.name: Yottoy Soft Toys & Books
sales.description: Beautiful hand-designed toys are few and far between, and that's why we are excited to show you what Yottoy has to offer. We especially love that their products focus on detail, and feature embroidery with the best fabrics. Take a look at the selection we have here, which includes plush toys and books that your kids will want to get their hands on.
